Glass Coating—Make Cleaning a Breeze

Enduroshield's glass corrosion coating and protection stops corrosion by repelling water, dirt, oil, soaps and shampoo residues.

Glass without Enduroshield

Enduroshield's glass corrosion coating and protection stops corrosion by repelling water, dirt, oil, soaps and shampoo residues.

Glass with Enduroshield

With our glass corrosion coating and protection system, a shower screen or splashback will stay clear and bright requiring up to 90% less cleaning and will potentially never need to be replaced.

What are your Terms & Conditions?

You can view and download Terms & Conditions.

Do you offer free measurements and quotes?

Yes! We will send out our professionals to provide obligation-free measurements and quotes. If you can measure yourself however, we can supply quotes fast over the phone for any of our standard products.

What is your turnaround time?

From the time you contact us, our professionals will visit within 24 hours to measure the job and provide a quote. Once a deposit is paid and your glass is ordered, we can manufacture and install your product within 5-10 working days.

Why are your products custom-built? Do you offer any stock products?

We custom-build our shower screens and wardrobes to fit perfectly, accounting for the angles of the floor and walls. For shower screens, this is necessary to prevent leaks and unsightly excess silicone work. For wardrobes, this is necessary for the doors to roll properly. We do supply stock frameless panels that are cheap and look good but come only at certain measurements. We also can supply high-quality hardware for DIY purposes. You can find our catalogue [here].

How do you take payment?

For any transaction, we are happy to take cash, credit card, internet transfer, cheque, or any other method you want to discuss with us.

Regarding the payment of any deposits, we do not record any credit card information and will contact you twice to make full payment of the invoice – once to pay the deposit, and once after the job is done. Though you are welcome to pay your invoice in full as you pay your deposit.

What colour metal do you supply?

We supply a wide range of metal colour options for our framed and semi-frameless screens. You can find a list of them [here]. If you are looking for another colour option, contact us and we may be able to help you.

What colour glass do you supply?

For our painted splashbacks, we can supply any colour from the Dulux colour range you can find [here].

What is the difference between the types of shower screens do you offer?

We supply framed, semi-frameless and frameless options. Framed screens are fully framed with aluminium and while they need more maintenance, they are our cheapest option and the most watertight.

Semi-frameless screens are partially framed with aluminium but has polished glass edges around the front of the screen that gives it a very sleek look. It is our second-cheapest option that fits into any modern home.

Frameless screens are polished glass panels secured to the wall with small metal brackets and silicone. The lack of a frame gives these panels a very elegant appearance, though they are our most expensive option as the glass must be thicker to make it sturdier.
